text: The 1985 Camus Singapore Masters was a professional non-ranking snooker tournament held in August 1985 in Singapore. Steve Davis won the tournament, defeating Terry Griffiths 4–2 in the final. ==Results== ===Group A=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=20|POS !width=165|Player !width=20|MP !width=20|MW !width=20|FW !width=20|FL !width=20|FD !width=20|PTS |- style="background:#aaffaa;" |1||style="text- align:left;"| Steve Davis |3||2||4||1||+3||4 |- |2||style="text-align:left;"| E Loh |3||1||2||2||0||2 |- |3||style="text-align:left;"| Tony Meo |3||1||1||4||-3||0 |} * Steve Davis 2–1 Tony Meo * Steve Davis 2–0 E Loh * E Loh 2–0 Tony Meo ===Group B=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=20|POS !width=165|Player !width=20|MP !width=20|MW !width=20|FW !width=20|FL !width=20|FD !width=20|PTS |- style="background:#aaffaa;" |1||style="text-align:left;"| Terry Griffiths |3||1||2||2||0||2 |- |2||style="text-align:left;"| Dennis Taylor |3||1||2||2||0||2 |- |3||style="text-align:left;"| Lin Kuan |3||1||2||2||0||2 |} * Terry Griffiths 2–0 Lin Kuan * Dennis Taylor 2–0 Terry Griffiths * Lin Kuan 2–0 Dennis Taylor ===Final=== * Steve Davis 4–2 Terry Griffiths ==References== Category:1985 in snooker Category:Sport in Singapore
title: 1985 Singapore Masters
